top.title: TechTreeMoe - War of War Ships Tech Tree Moe
top.description: Integrate 艦隊收藏、戰艦少女、鋼鐵少女、碧藍航線、最終戰艦、Victory Belles and fanworks to let tech tree being moemoe!

intro.title: Intro
intro.customContent: There is lots of warship girls icons, choose your favorite and let your tech tree being moemoe.
intro.convenientContent: Using changeable button to find changeable item quickly
intro.savableContent: Using Local Storage to save your option instantly.
intro.quickContent: Click the download button directly to download the default package
intro.attentionContent: Nation background and ship type icon isn't include in this mod.

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.chooseContent: Click on the brush icon in the lower right corner of the ship image to open the selection page and select the desired icon
tutorial.downloadContent: After choose, click download button on the top right to download mod.
tutorial.installContent: After unzip, put gui folder into res_mods/x.x.x/ and enjoy!

about.contactContent:
If you have any suggest, please open Issues in Github.
(Site bug, ship ,missing, material provide, function request etc.)
